content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):United States ChargA daAffaires, Natalie Baker called on Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday to discuss matters of mutual interest. The DPM/FM reaffirmed Pakistanas commitment to shared objectives and enhanced cooperation with the US in international forums, particularly in light of Pakistanas UN Security Council membership (2025-2026). Both sides underscored the significance of the longstanding Pakistan-U.S. partnership in promoting regional peace and security.
